item.description:
My house again: the Idle Dog, 15 Glendale Street, Maynard, MA 01754. 978-973-7855. Deb Muise. 1pm till whenever.

COME MEET THE NEW PUPPY! She's 11 weeks, a ruby cavalier named Daphne. She's unbearably cute and relentlessly happy. Obvious theme for this meeting would be VD, but all contributions welcome! There are expenses for goodies (dog & human) and for the $20/month membership fee.

See you then!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll make a sign for the front of the house. Check my website for directions: www.theidledog.com
item.why: The food can be great, The company is also friendly, and the dogs are wicked cute.

group.name: The Massachusetts Small Breed Dogs Meetup Group

item.name: The Massachusetts Small Breed Dogs February Meetup
